main.name: Aarti Gurjar
main.description: I create fun, innovative, accessible, and responsive websites & web apps.
main.bio: My name is Aarti, I'm a Front End Developer. I try to write maintainable, performant and widely compatible markup and styles. I have a good eye for design, can create compelling visual artefacts and love to develop in HTML, CSS, JS, React and related technologies. I am inclined towards learning new technologies and embracing change. I am open to whatever technology, processes or techniques which will improve my ability to deliver high quality software as quickly as possible. Currently I'm actively applying for jobs.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or anything else.

education.description: Worked on WordPress, SEO & Digital Marketing Skills
Received Google Scholarship in 2018 to learn front end development.
